subject: Self Care
title: Movement Snacking
description: A short lesson to help you apply Movement Snacking.

hook.text: Sitting for eight hours then exercising for one doesn't undo the damage. You need movement throughout.

buildup.text: Movement snacking means short bursts of activity â€” a walk, squats, stretches â€” scattered through the day.

discovery.text: Five minutes of movement every hour reduces cardiovascular risk more effectively than one gym session.

twist.text: You don't need a gym or equipment. Standing, walking up stairs, or stretching at your desk all count.

climax.text: Set a timer for every hour. Stand up. Move for two minutes. Over a day, it adds up to real exercise.

punchline.text: Move often. Small bursts beat one long session.

quiz.question: What is movement snacking?
options: Short bursts of activity scattered through the day
